d.DAO

Interface CouponDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CouponDbDAO

    public interface CouponDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      create a coupon on the DB.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllCoupons()
      this method gets all the coupons from the DB, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.
      Coupon getCoupon(long couponId)
      this method returns from the DB 1 coupon details with the specified couponID, creates a new coupon java bean, sets all of the parameters according to the DB information retrieved, and returns that coupon.
      Coupon getCouponByName(java.lang.String title)
      this method returns one coupon by it's title.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByType(CouponType couponType)
      this method gets all the coupons OF SPECIFIED TYPE from the DB, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.
      Coupon getOneCompanyCoupon(long compId, long couponId)
      this method returns from the DB 1 coupon which belongs to a specified company.
      void populateCompanyCoupon(long compID, long couponID)
      this method is used to insert newly created coupons to the company_coupon JOIN table, listing the id of the company that created the coupon, and the id of the coupon created.
      void populateCustomerCoupon(long custID, long couponID)
      this method is used to insert newly purchased coupons to the customer_coupon JOIN table, listing the id of the customer that purchased the coupon, and the id of the coupon purchased.
      void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      remove a coupon from the DB using it's DB id.
      void removeCouponsFromCompany_Coupon(Company comp)
      this method is used to remove coupon listings from the company_coupon JOIN table, when the specified company is being deleted.
      void removeCouponsFromCustomer_Coupon(Company comp)
      this method is used to remove purchased coupon listings from the customer_coupon JOIN table, when the specified company is being deleted.
      void removeCouponWithId(long id)
      ## This is a UTILITY method ## remove a coupon from the DB using it's DB id.
      void removeDeletedCompanysCoupons(Company comp)
      this method is used to delete the coupons of a deleted company from the COUPON TABLE only.
      void removeDeletedCustomersCoupons(Customer cust)
      this method is used to remove all coupon listings from the customer_coupon JOIN table, once the specified customer is being removed.
      void removeExpiredFromCompanyCoupon(java.sql.Date today)
      this method is used to remove expired coupons from the company_coupon JOIN table.
      void removeExpiredFromCoupon(java.sql.Date today)
      this method is used to remove expired coupons from the coupon table.
      void removeExpiredFromCustomerCoupon(java.sql.Date today)
      this method is used to remove expired coupons from the customer_coupon JOIN table.
      void removeFromCompanyCoupon(long couponId)
      this method is used to remove a coupon listing from the company_coupon JOIN table, upon coupon removal.
      void removeFromCustomerCoupon(long couponId)
      this method is used to remove a coupon listing from the customer_coupon JOIN table, upon coupon removal.
      void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      update a coupon (everything BUT Id) on the DB
      void updateCouponWithId(long id, java.lang.String newTitle, java.sql.Date newStartDate, java.sql.Date newEndDate, int newAmount, CouponType newType, java.lang.String newMessage, double newPrice, java.lang.String newImage)
      ## This is a UTILITY method ## update a coupon on the DB based on it's DB Id.

    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        long createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
           throws ConnectionPoolException,
                  DAOException
        create a coupon on the DB. this is also used to get the automatically generated coupon ID from the SQL DB, and assign it to this coupon Java bean.
        Parameters:
        coupon -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ConnectionPoolException
        DAOException

                           long couponId)
                    throws ConnectionPoolException,
                           DAOException

      • getCouponByName

        Coupon getCouponByName(java.lang.String title)
                throws ConnectionPoolException,
                       DAOException
        this method returns one coupon by it's title. returns null if coupon with the specified title does not exist. used mainly to check name availability for new coupons.
        Parameters:
        title -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ConnectionPoolException
        DAOException

      • removeExpiredFromCoupon

        void removeExpiredFromCoupon(java.sql.Date today)
                      throws ConnectionPoolException,
                             DAOException
        this method is used to remove expired coupons from the coupon table. gets today's date as a parameter and builds the SQL query around it. mainly used from the DailyCouponExpirationTask.
        Parameters:
        today -
        Throws:
        ConnectionPoolException
        DAOException
